column1: These are the search criteria you submitted :

column2: Reserved for all students interested in being in a woodwind, brass, or percussion ensemble at Hope. Students must be available on Monday, August 28 for audition and placement in Mus 120 - 160. Auditions will not be held on other days.
Reserved for students interested in playing a string instrument in the Orchestra at Hope. Students must be available for audition and placement in Mus 120 on Monday, August 28.

Reserved for students who have never taken piano at Hope. Students must be available on Monday, August 28 for audition and placement in Mus 179. Auditions will not be held on other days. Course fee will be added upon placement.

Reserved for students who have never taken voice at Hope. Students must be available on Monday, August 28 for audition and placement in the appropriate voice course. Auditions will not be held on other days. Course fee will be added upon placement.
